package.name: dub_sim
package.description:
Main package for the simulation variant of the Dubins traffic domain
The roslaunch file that instantiates Kobuki models in Gazebo relies on a patched plugin that is available from
https://github.com/slivingston/kobuki_desktop
Consult the README file of this domain for instructions about installing it. My (SCL) intent is to contribute patches upstream after additional testing.
